issue.title: [R] Sanitize paths in open_dataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9743](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9743). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`open_dataset("~/path")` currently fails. As everywhere else we pass paths to the filesystem module, we need to normalize the path.
